name: philipmarschall
text: I know a girl named Derek!

name: radchillies
text:
My real name is Derek and I'm a dude.

I read this strip and my heart sank

name: deimosrising
text: Other strips indicate that Ray was not, in fact, a particularly fat child.

name: laikalost
text: Who's to say he wasn't an insecure little kitten?

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Oh lord, if there were some kind of phrase to pull me out of a hangover, I'd give most of my money to the speaker.

name: catachresis
text: Damn, on re-reading this I cursed that I had never used this phrase to wake up a hungover person.

name: sargasm
text: The Donald Trump of homeless people.

name: antsama
text: I bet Teodor has had to use this line to snap Ray out of  this before.

name: heatbag
text: I really want to know why telling Ray he was a fat child snaps him out of his ramblings.

name: ethelthefrog
text: The anguish of being forced to recall that one used to be a fat child can snap a cat's distracted mind back into focus. . . focus on the pain.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Pride, dogg, nothing but simple pride.

name: hellofyellin
text: Beef waving hi in the last panel really makes it for me.

name: mikebox
text: Same here, Teodore's verbal assault to snap Ray out, Beef all meek to let him know what's real.

name: shutup_shutup
text: He is possibly waving away bad smell.

name: projectyl
text: Still moderately Influenced, the main cat thinks about killing dogs.

name: projectyl
text:
Upon a reread, I see my apologies are owed. My addled brain read "anesthesia" as "euthanasia".

The strangeness is lessened, but not eliminated.

name: catgrl131
text: Well, it doesn't matter. Whichever removes the dogg's pain...

name: i_love_kate
text: God, let's not get into the whole canine mercy-killing debate... There is just too much to take into consideration, Assetbar.

name: tekende
text: It is such a complex topic

name: nutmeg
text: What in the jam

name: tangram
text: It is such a complex topic.

name: sarabria
text: the dick dale line is amazing.

name: cmr
text: he plays 14 gauge strings.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Bo Derek is a woman with the name of Derek.

name: lolsworth
text: Who lamed this

name: stuart
text: Ray talks like Beef when hung over

name: littlefatdog
text: splendid & novel adjective alert: "farted-in"

name: ethelthefrog
text: Donald Trump IS a corny douchebag.

name: softerworld
text: And finally, after 3 (?) Trump references, Onstad isn't afraid to say it.

name: clever-nickname
text: As of now, I am going to start saying "holy dickens and delilah, what in the jam"

name: serf
text: teodor is pretty brilliant in this one. motherfucker comes out swingin.

name: rgiskard
text: Hey RAY! You smell like farted-in vinegar! How come?

name: valrus
text: Ray looks a little like Emeril in panels 4 and 6.

name: sidxdeadgod
text: A comment left by sidxdeadgod was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, luckypyjamas, yingkaixing, Darthemed)

name: beansdooma
text: A comment left by beansdooma was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, Zem, yingkaixing)

name: luckypyjamas
text: it looks like beef is shaking his fist at ray in the last panel but i can't be sure

name: sarmatron
text:
First Achewood I ever read.

I basically had no idea what was going on, but I still couldn't stop laughing at... pretty much the entirety of the bottom four panels. Good times, man. Good times.

name: c4keman
text:
"You... were... a... fat... child!"

Someday I will say that to someone, and it will be awesome.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i will say it in proper italics , to sound so much more a dick.

name: zedpower
text: It's kind of sad that Téodor can only gather the courage to speak his mind about Trump while he's in Germany. At least say it on the same continent, dude.

name: woodenteeth
text:
oh man. do i totally want to know what asian-character that is in your post. like some ghost in the machine could fracture your keystrokes to get out a desperate message.

knowing how life really works though, it probably says "gherkin" or some such.

name: zedpower
text: A mystery asian character? All assetbar gives me is a sad little diamond shape with a question mark inside. I'm feeling ripped off.

name: woodenteeth
text: It all depends on what type of acid you took and when you took it...

name: yourmalarky
text: 5 for fat child wake up. Onstad continues to admit what everyone is secretly afraid of.

name: snowman
text: Roast Beef is concerned about waking up the wino.

name: senseihollywood
text:
The Fire-Rescue folks around here do it by jamming their thumb into your solar plexus.

Please don't ask me how I know this.

name: killingthejay
text: Teodor's right about Trump.

name: n0umena
text: This is golden. Panel 4. What a thing to say upon waking from a drunken stupor.

name: c_dizzle
text: In panels 4 and 6 ray's mouth reminds me of Master Shake's...i don't know why.

name: jonmw
text:
I want to know how Teodor knows what farted-in vinegar smells like. Because, you see, this was BEFORE the situation where he might have learned that.
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=02092007

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: If you think that is the only time Lyle has done something obscene in vinegar, you are living in a world Teodor wishes he also inhabited.

name: vheissu
text: This comic is obsessed with D-names: Donald, Dickens, Delilah, Dick Dale, Derek... why?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Dunno.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: I wonder what farted-in vinegar WOULD smell like...has someone tried it?

name: coherentaxe
text: Yes .

name: puguglypress
text: This comic could just be the last panel.
